1101111011001100 0110110000100011 1 -> sum: 0100101011110000, cout: 1
0101011101111100 0001010111110001 0 -> sum: 0110110101101101, cout: 0

1001111000111000 1011010101010110 0 -> sum: 0101001110001110, cout: 1
0011111011001000 0000010011001100 0 -> sum: 0100001110010100, cout: 0
1000001001101111 0101101001011100 0 -> sum: 1101110011001011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
